Title: Documentation - This project organize the directories and files, a title and thumbnail for each directory can be created, for the files, a title, description and preview is possible.
Summary - Home automation using IOT and WEB technology
Architecture
Desc: The architecture is simply a network of wifi controllers communicating to the host via HTTP (half duplex) or WS (full duplex)

Title: Overview and Architecture
Desc: The project use IOT technology, the hardware is based on ESP8266 and ESP32 from Expressif. The IDE used is uPycraft with micropython (python on a chip). UI use the web technology (HTML, CSS and JS). The backend is serverless using Firebase cloud functions with Node JS, the database used is Firestore. The notification system is based on Functions Messaging and the notification mobile application is based on Google Flutter. The vocal dialog bot used Google DialogFlow with JSON format for the request to the bot.

Title: Overview

Title: Tag Linker - This project is linking a tag to any entities related to it
Summary
Desc: Tag linker allow a tag to be links to any Documents such as P&ID, Circuit Diagrams, Location drawings, process screens, or any other kind of Documents related to the tag.
